skillTree.localised_description: This enormous, revolting Arachnarok Spider shrine upon which Nobber channels the power of the Bad Moon, canalizes more winds of magic than any goblin should have.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

skillTree.localised_description: Some leadaz need lieutenants, othaz accidentally blow im up if dey are close. Nobba ‘as learned his lesson, mostly.
